summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Municipal Library Board is convening a special called meeting on December 12, 2023, at 4:00 PM at the Central Library. The meeting aims to discuss the Library’s Strategic & Facilities Plan, ensuring equitable access for all residents.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order by Chair Thomas Perryman.
2. Presentation on the Library’s Strategic & Facilities Plan by Group4.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will address the strategic direction and facility needs of the Dallas Municipal Library, potentially impacting future library services and infrastructure. The presentation is expected to outline key initiatives and proposals that may require budget considerations and policy adjustments.

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek to approve or provide feedback on the Strategic & Facilities Plan presented by Group4. Additionally, participants wishing to speak must register 24 hours in advance, indicating a structured approach to public engagement during the meeting. 

The meeting will also include provisions for reasonable accommodations for participants requiring assistance, ensuring inclusivity. A video stream of the meeting will be available post-adjournment for those unable to attend.
